long long int modpow(long long int base,long long int exp)
{
    long long int val=1;
    while(exp!=0)
    {
        if(exp%2==1)
            val=(val*base)%M;
        exp=exp/2;
        base=(base*base)%M;
    }
    return val;
}
int main()
{
    ll fact[100069];
    fact[0]=fact[1]=1;
    FOR(i,2,100009)
        fact[i]=(fact[i-1]*i)%M;
    int t;
    si(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        ll n,r;
        sll(n),sll(r);
        if(n<r)
            puts("0");
        else
            printf("%lld\n",(fact[n]*modpow((fact[r]*fact[n-r])%M,M-2))%M);
    }
    return 0;
}
